description: A study of Norwegian literature from the Saga period through Ibsen, this chronological overview examines literary developments in the context of historical, cultural, and linguistic change and relates Norwegian literature to international trends. Lectures, essays, and class discussion are in Norwegian. Prerequisite: Norwegian 253, or equivalent. Offered Fall Semester only.
name: Norsk Lit Til 1890
prerequisites: Norwegian 253, or equivalent. Offered Fall Semester only.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Norwegian 253, or equivalent. Offered Fall Semester only.

title: Norwegian Literature from the Saga Period to 1890
